item.title: CVE-2023-5047|2024-08-02T07:44:53.763Z -- drd%20fleet%20leasing -- drdrive
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in DRD Fleet Leasing DRDrive allows SQL Injection.This issue affects DRDrive: before 20231006.
